Join an Exciting Night Project – We Are Looking for Observers for Production

Dear Candidate,

We are looking for 10 dedicated employees for a time registration proje

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Join an Exciting Night Project – We Are Looking for Observers for Production

Dear Candidate,

We are looking for 10 dedicated employees for a time registration project for one of our largest clients in a major production company. This is an important project where you will be responsible for measuring and optimizing work processes in production by timing various tasks.

About the Job:

  • Work period: As soon as possible until the end of February
  • Working hours: Night shifts (between 6:00 PM and 6:00 AM)
  • Schedule: 3 shifts of 12 hours per week (possibly mixed week days and weekend shifts)
  • Salary: 190 DKK/hour plus add-ons
  • Location: Hillerød
  • Training will be provided

Your Tasks:

  • Walk around with a stopwatch and register time on work processes
  • Ensure accurate measurements and data collection
  • Collaborate with student assistants and the project team

We Are Looking for Someone Who:

  • Speaks and understands English
  • Can take responsibility and work independently
  • Is flexible and able to work evening and night shifts
  • Is reliable and can commit to the full duration of the project
  • Can comply with GMP regulations (no jewelry, nail polish, etc.)

We aim to have the same 10 employees throughout the project period to ensure stability and continuity.

Are you interested in being part of this exciting optimization project? Send your application as soon as possible – we are hiring as soon as possible!

details.FormattedPurpose:
Join an Exciting Night Project – We Are Looking for Observers for Production

Dear Candidate,

We are looking for 10 dedicated employees for a time registration project for one of our largest clients in a major production company. This is an important project where you will be responsible for measuring and optimizing work processes in production by timing various tasks.

About the Job:

  • Work period: As soon as possible until the end of February
  • Working hours: Night shifts (between 6:00 PM and 6:00 AM)
  • Schedule: 3 shifts of 12 hours per week (possibly mixed week days and weekend shifts)
  • Salary: 190 DKK/hour plus add-ons
  • Location: Hillerød
  • Training will be provided

Your Tasks:

  • Walk around with a stopwatch and register time on work processes
  • Ensure accurate measurements and data collection
  • Collaborate with student assistants and the project team

We Are Looking for Someone Who:

  • Speaks and understands English
  • Can take responsibility and work independently
  • Is flexible and able to work evening and night shifts
  • Is reliable and can commit to the full duration of the project
  • Can comply with GMP regulations (no jewelry, nail polish, etc.)

We aim to have the same 10 employees throughout the project period to ensure stability and continuity.

Are you interested in being part of this exciting optimization project? Send your application as soon as possible – we are hiring as soon as possible!
